item.title: By: Martin G
item.dc:creator: Martin G
item.description:
Want? No.
Need? Maybe.
Embarrased to be associated with? Ahh, now we're getting somewhere... Never underestimate the power of shame.
item.content:encoded:
Want? No.

Need? Maybe.

Embarrased to be associated with? Ahh, now we’re getting somewhere… Never underestimate the power of shame.

item.title: By: bfp
item.dc:creator: bfp
item.description:
You *want* to do the lawn?
I am confused.
item.content:encoded:
You *want* to do the lawn?

I am confused.

item.title: By: Martin G
item.dc:creator: Martin G
item.description:
It's a zen thing. Fill your weekend with nothing, and whatever you achieve will lighten your heart, Grasshopper.
Actually, the killer is when 'child-time' and 'must-do' war with 'want to do'. You should see how long my front lawn is right now...
item.content:encoded:
It’s a zen thing. Fill your weekend with nothing, and whatever you achieve will lighten your heart, Grasshopper.

Actually, the killer is when ‘child-time’ and ‘must-do’ war with ‘want to do’. You should see how long my front lawn is right now…
